description: Alif. Lam. Mim. W.T.F.
This Scripture is a guidance unto those who ward off (evil).
Those who believe in unseen things will survive their own death and are the successful people.
To be truly wise you must believe whatever the foolish believe.
Allah especially dislikes people who pretend to believe around Muslims
If Allah willed He could destroy their hearing and their sight.
If you doubt the truth of the Quran then try making some stuff up.
Allah taught Adam all the names of all the species to shame the angels
After the people worshipped a calf Moses told them to kill themselves.
Allah struck Moses with lightning and then revived him just so that Moses would thank him for it!
Allah turned Jews into apes
Allah told the Jews to sacrifice a bright yellow cow and used it to make a zombie.
There are rocks which fall down for the fear of Allah.
Who is better than Allah at coloring?
Allah guides whoever the hell he wants on a straight path. And once in a while he changes the direction of the path for no reason whatsoever.
Allah changes the holy direction.
Those who disbelieve are deaf and dumb and blind.
Life is beautiful to us unbelievers and we like to laugh at believers!
Drinking and gambling are sinful but useful.
Allah's really important things in life
After your divorced wives have reached the end of their 3 month waiting period you can take them or leave them.
When a man dies his wives can't have sex for four months and ten days. After that if they're not pregnant it's no sin for the dead man if his wives have sex again.
Allah told thousands of soldiers to die. Then after they died Allah brought them back to life.
Allah asks for a loan promising to pay us back with interest.
Allah has angels carrying Noah's ark.
Allah confuses Saul with Gideon.
Abraham argues about sun rising and setting.
Allah makes a man die for 100 years and then brings him back to life.
Allah tells Abraham to cut up the bodies of four birds...
Allah and Isa and magic clay birds.
Allah is the best of schemers.
Don't argue about things that you know nothing about.
Those who retreat while fighting in a holy war are inspired by Satan.
Inheritance laws: Islamic Economics 101.
We shall cast him into Fire easy-peasy!
Don't make Satan your imaginary friend. Choose Allah instead!
If you get dirty and can't find any clean water you can clean up by rubbing your face and hands in some clean dirt.
Virgins await those who enter paradise.
Heads - Allah wins; Tails - you lose.
If someone says Hi to you say Hi back to them.
Don't cut cattle's ears and thereby change Allah's creation.
Jesus was pretend crucified.
What not to eat
Jesus has a conversation with a godly unclean spirit named Legion.
Muhammad who was illiterate offers to explain the scriptures to Christians and Jews.
Christians are disbelievers for believing in the divinity of Christ.
Allah sent a raven scratching up the ground to show him how to hide his brother's naked corpse.
Allah has turned some Christians and Jews into apes and swine.
Allah warns believers not to ask to many questions because honest answers will cause them to lose their faith.
Jesus made a bird out of clay that flew away when he blew on it.
The disciples of Jesus were muslims!
Jesus' disciples ask Jesus to send a table of food down from heaven. And he delivers!
Jesus warns his disciples that will catch holy hell if they ever stop believing.
The Christian Trinity is the Father Mother and Son.
See Allah destroy previous generations.
Allah created the jinn but he is not in partnership with them.
Allah appointed jinns to be the adversaries of prophets.
Jinns have led many humans astray.
The jinn were disbelievers.
The devil is a vegetarian. Kill and eat lots of animals so you won't be like him.
Adam and his nameless wife didn't know they were naked until they ate from the tree.
Entire nations of the jinn have been tormented with fire.
When Allah revealed himself to Moses the mountain came crashing down.
The golden calf mooed.
The Prophet who can neither read nor write.
Allah presented the Jews a big fish on the Sabbath day when they were forbidden to fish and then withheld the fish on the day that they were permitted to fish.
Allah turns humans into apes!
Those who deny Muhammad's revelations are like dogs.
Allah's pronouns are: We/I/He
Do not turn your face away when the Prophet is speaking!
This book is old folk fairytales.
Those that live or die in war are a clear proof of Allah's sovereignty.
Allah is the best of plotters.
Exhort the believers to fight. They will win easily because disbelievers are without intelligence.
Allah sent down invisible warriors to fight for him!
The Jews say: Ezra is the son of Allah. (They don't!)
Don't try to enjoy this life. The fun starts after you die.
Ye cannot harm Him at all.
Allah supported Muhammad with armies that no one else could see.
The people who heard Muhammad told him to find another messenger or change the message.
Denying the revelations of Allah is the worst sin imaginable.
Muslims will look good in heaven. There'll be no dust on their faces!
The Quran is so perfect it could never be invented. Go ahead and try to write a Surah as great if you can!
It's all your fault!
The Pharaoh became a Muslim to avoid being drowned by Allah.
Allah created Israel.
If his shirt is torn in front then she speaks truth but if torn from the back - she is a liar.
Joseph's brothers visited him and he knew them but they did not.
Everyone and everything and their shadow bows to Allah twice a day whether they want to or not.
Satan gives a little speech.
You [Muhammad] are  indeed a madman!
God is pissed at Iblis for not bowing down and worshipping man. Wouldn't this be idolatry?
Allah sends Iblis to hell for refusing to worship humans and then immediately changes his mind at Iblis' request.
Allah made mountains that that don't shake when you jump up and down.
Allah is too proud to love proud people.
Just a bunch of old fables.
Allah told bees to eat from all fruits but they decided to eat nectar and pollen instead.
The Quran explains everything to everyone.
Muhammad's famous midnight ride on the back of a flying donkey
The Quran is the best guide to everything.
Allah has prepared a painful doom for those who disbelieve in the Hereafter.
How many generations Allah has destroyed since Noah!
Allah will destroy every town before the Day of Resurrection.
Blind people will be blind in the Hereafter and more!
Humans and jinn working together could not produce the Quran.
The sun rises and sets at particular places on a flat earth. At the westernmost point on earth the sun sets in a muddy spring.
Mary complains to a palm tree about the pains of childbirth.
Mary - the mother of Jesus - was the sister of Aaron.https://quran.com/16?startingVerse=15 (Muhammad confused Mary with Miriam.)
Jesus professes his Islamic faith while still in the cradle.
Idris. Lo! he was a saint a prophet. Idris who?
Allah has the most beautiful names.
Moses turns his staff into a serpent.
We [Allah] have revealed it [the Quran] as a Lecture in Arabic. Why Arabic? Why indeed?
Muhammad's critics claimed that his supposed revelations were muddled dreams that he made up as he went along.
Idris and Dhu'l-Kifl. All were of the steadfast. No one knows who they were supposed to be.
We have created you from dust / a drop of seed / a clot / little lump of flesh - shapely and shapeless.
Allah will raise those who are in the graves.
We [Allah] created man from wet earth.
There is a madness in Muhammad.
A husband can accuse his wife of adultery with only one witness (himself). But he has to swear five times.
Obey Allah and obey the messenger. (But mostly the messenger -- Muhammad.)
Muhammad is a joke.
Stay away from poets.
Solomon was taught the language of birds.
Birds fought in Solomon's army.
Talking ants!
Solomon talks to the ants.
Solomon is upset that the hoopee is not among the birds in his army.
Solomon says he'll kill the hoopee unless he has a good excuse for his absence.
Allah produces creation then he reproduces it.
Allah makes dead people live and live people dead.
Allah quickened the earth after it died.
Those who make the Quran the butt of mockery will have a shameful doom.
Remember when we [Allah] sent a big wind that you couldn't see?
Is he [Muhammad] lying or is he possessed?
We [Allah] can make the sky fall.
We commanded the birds and hills to sing psalms.
We forced the jinn to work for Solomon.
The Jinn kept working after Solomon had died.
Angels have 2 or 3 or 4 wings.
Allah gave the moon mansions to live in until she returns like an old shrivelled palm leaf.
Sun and moon float in one orbit.
Allah made the seven heavens in two days with lamps.
Nothing looks like Allah.
Allah revealed the Quran in one blessed night.
Allah liked the Jews more than everyone else.
People who listened to Muhammad didn't understand anything he was babbling on about.
Allah doesn't like the concept of nicknames.
Would you like to eat the flesh of your dead brother?
Would you teach Allah your religion?
We [Allah] spread the earth out. That's a reminder for every slave.
Allah created the jinn to worship him.
Allah tells Muhammad to ask his critics if they have a stairway to heaven.
Do they have a stairway to heaven? Or does Allah] have daughters whereas you have sons?
Have you thought about Al-Lat Al-'Uzza and Manat lately?
Why don't you spend your money for Allah?.
If you lend money to Allah he'll double it.
When the hypocrites say You are Allah's messenger Allah knows they are lying. So Muhammad isn't Allah's messenger
Allah has made it lawful for you (Muslims) to break your oaths.
Allah made the stars as missiles to throw at devils.
Allah assures Muhammad that he is not a madman.
Allah carried Muhammad on Noah's ship during the flood.
Don't hold a book is in your left hand.
Earth is flat.
There's a written record of the vile in Sijjin. But no one knows where Sijjin is.
There's a written record of the righteouse in 'Illiyin. But no one knows where 'Illiyin is.
The righteous lounge on couches drinking wine mixed with the water of Tasnim. No one know what Tasnim is.
They're plotting a plot. I [Allah] am plotting a plot.

We [Allah] will make you (Muhammad) read so you won't forget. That seems like a good plan. The prophet that Allah chose to create the Quran should know how to read. Allah said he'd make him read but he never did. Muhammad died illiterate.
Allah created man in an atmosphere.
Allah spread the earth out flat like a pancake.
Allah doesn't hate you.
Didn't we dilate your bosom?
Allah sent swarms of flying creatures that dropped stones on the owners of the elephants.
Abu Lahab will die. His wealth won't save him. He'll be plunged into a flaming fire.
Allah has no children and is nobody's child.
Allah is the creator of evil. We must try to avoid Allah's evil creations.
Darkness is evil.
